segments.text: This kitchen is a mess, and that woman isn't even paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes while the sink floods the whole area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water splashing everywhere, and her foot's in itâ€”wake up!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are raiding the cookie jar like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool is going to break his neck if it tips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in hand, grinning like he owns the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there helping him, reaching for her piece.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They shouldn't be climbing like that without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's growing, and someone will slip for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks perfect, but in here it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's so absorbed in that one plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies are probably for later, and they're spoiling it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes me so frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR
